about.summary: A command line parser inspired by Python's 'optparse' library to be used with Rscript to write "#!" shebang scripts that accept short and long flag/options.

name: r-optparse
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.6.2' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-optparse
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/optparse_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/optparse/optparse_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b5a5a49ae05005f20359868329b73daac83d50f5e088981dcf5c41399534377f

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{posix}}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-getopt >=1.20.2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-getopt >=1.20.2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('optparse')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('optparse')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/trevorld/r-optparse
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: A command line parser inspired by Python's 'optparse' library to be used with Rscript
    to write "#!" shebang scripts that accept short and long flag/options.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Encoding: UTF-8

# Type: Package
